member.name: T:MapControl.Module1
member.summary: This sample shows how to use a MapControl to display an overview map.
member.remarks: 1. In Visual Studio click the Build menu. Then select Build Solution. 1. Click Start button to open ArcGIS Pro. 1. ArcGIS Pro will open. 1. Open the "C:\Data\FeatureTest\FeatureTest.aprx" project. 1. Click on the Add-In tab on the ribbon. 1. Within this tab there is a **Show Overview** button. Click on the button to activate the overview map. ![UI](Screenshots/Screen1.png)

member.name: P:MapControl.Module1.Current
member.summary: Retrieve the singleton instance to this module here

member.name: M:MapControl.Module1.CanUnload
member.summary: Called by Framework when ArcGIS Pro is closing
member.returns: False to prevent Pro from closing, otherwise True
